```{r}
library(hms)

convert_decimal_to_time <- function(time) {
  hours <- floor(time)
  minutes <- round((decimaltime - hours) * 60)
  time_str <- sprintf("%02d:%02d", hours, minutes)
  return(time_str)
}
data$`Sleep Start Time` <- as_hms(sapply(data$`Sleep Start Time`, convert_decimal_to_time))
data$`Sleep End Time` <- as_hms(sapply(data$`Sleep Start Time`, convert_decimal_to_time))
data$`Total Sleep Hours` <- round(data$`Total Sleep Hours`)
data$`Exercise (mins/day)`
```
